segments.text: Hi ! I need to request a wake-up call for tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time do you want the call ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need two calls , one at 7 and another at 7 fifteen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can certainly do that . Expect a call from us at 7 o'colock and then again at 7 fifteen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , can I change the latter wake-up call to 7 thirty . am ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can certainly do that . Is there anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't think of anything . If I do think of something , I'll be sure to call again .
segments.speaker: S1
